contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|beat|beating}} '''Beat''' or '''beats''' may refer to: {{tocright}} ==Area of territory== *[[Beat (police)]], the territory and time that a police officer patrols *[[Beat reporting]], a subject of coverage by a journalist *[[Gay beat]], an area frequented by gay men for the purpose of casual sex *Forest beat, in forestry administration, a divisional subunit of a [[Forest range]] ==Criminology== *The act of beating; [[Battery (crime)|battery]] ==Entertainment and fiction== === Film and theatre === * [[Beat (2000 film)|''Beat'' (2000 film)]], a film about writer William Seward Burroughs * [[Beat (1998 film)|''Beat'' (1998 film)]], a 1998 Japanese film * [[Beat (1997 film)|''Beat'' (1997 film)]], a 1997 South Korean gangster film * [[Beat (filmmaking)]], the smallest unit of dramatic action in a play * [[Directorial beat]], an exchange of behavior between characters in a script * [[Unit of action]], also called a beat ===Music and acoustics=== *[[Beat (acoustics)]], volume fluctuations due to interference between sounds of different frequencies *[[Beat (album)|''Beat'' (album)]], a 1982 album by King Crimson *[[Beat (music)]], the basic time unit of a piece of music *[[Beat (song)|"Beat" (song)]], a 2005 song by Kaela Kimura *[[The Beat (band)]], a ska band * [[Beat (band)]], a Finnish band *[[Beat music]], a rock music genre that developed in the United Kingdom in the early 1960s *[[Beats by Dr. Dre]], a brand of headphones ===Video games=== *[[Beat (video game character)]], a character from ''Jet Set Radio'' *[[Beats (video game)|''Beats'' (video game)]], a 2007 video game for PlayStation Portable *Beat, a character from ''[[Eternal Sonata]]'' *Beat, a robot bird in the [[List of Mega Man characters#Beat|''Mega Man'' series]] *Beat, a character from ''[[The World Ends with You]]'' *beat, a character from " kingdom hearts recoded " ==Motor vehicles== ===Cars=== * Beat, a model of the Japanese [[Daiichi Kosho Whisper]] paramotor * Chevrolet Beat, a concept car providing the basis for the [[Daewoo Matiz]] M300 * [[Honda Beat]], a 1991â€“1996 roadster ===Other=== * [[Honda FC50]], a 50cc motor scooter also called "The Beat" ==Other== * [[Beat (name)]], a German male given name * [[Beat (soda)]], a drink manufactured by the Coca-Cola Company in Mexico * [[Sailing#Beating or "working"|Beating]], in sailing upwind close-hauled with the wind coming from one side and then tacking * beat, a time unit of [[Swatch Internet Time]] * Beat, an intentional pause for emphasis in [[comic timing]] ==See also== *[[Beat Generation]], writers of beat poetry and other beat literature *[[The Beat (disambiguation)]] *[[Downbeat (disambiguation)]] *[[On the Beat (disambiguation)]] *[[Beet]], a plant {{disambiguation}}
